abstract: Pres Obama, during commencement speech at United States Air Force Academy, urges cadets to embrace diplomacy and other nonlethal tools to solve problems across world, even as he emphasizes importance of US military arsenal.

headline.print_headline: A Parting Message to Air Force Cadets
headline.main: Obama Tells Air Force Cadets to Embrace Diplomacy

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: At the Air Force Academy’s commencement, the president said the military must be willing to use the full arsenal of America’s defense, including its nonlethal tools, to resolve disputes.
lead_paragraph: At the Air Force Academy’s commencement, the president said the military must be willing to use the full arsenal of America’s defense, including its nonlethal tools, to resolve disputes.
